editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-3v: Excerpt of Praises of Mary, incomplete at the beginning, starting with Friday. F-17r: Image of Saint George zä-Säläda Mogäs, መልክአ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ዘሰሌዳ፡ ሞገስ፡. Répertoire 147. F-24v: Image of Saint George, Mälk‘a Giyorgis, መልክአ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡. Répertoire 208. EMIP 276, 2042/Tweed 93, 2045/Tweed 96. Incipit: ሰላም፡ ለጽንሰትከ፡ ወለልደትከ፡ ቡሩክ፡ . . ..; F-35v: Image of the Savior of the World, Mälk‘a Mädḫane Aläm, መልክአ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡. Répertoire 164. F-50v: Image of Täklä Haymanot, Mälk‘a Täklä Haymanot, መልክአ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡. incipit: ሰላም፡ ለጽንሰትከ፡ ወለልደትከ፡ እምከርሥ፡, Répertoire 211; MG 566ff; EMIP 20, .; F-56r: Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, Mälk‘a Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡, Incipit: ሰላም: ለጽንሰትከ: መሠረተ: ነገር: ወውጣኔ:; Répertoire 196. MG 553ff.. and passim mentions the owner, ወልደ ገብርኤል, and scribe, ገብረ ዮሕንስ. : record: "This is from the ancient church books, written during the reign of ዓፄ Suseyos, 1623 EC" Susenyos I reigned 1606-1632 but the hand is clearly 20th century. Perhaps the note refers to the manuscript from which this one was copied.
